attributes.action: Acknowledge the existence of Pastafarianism as a legitimate religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pastafarianism is a fast-growing religion that is sweeping across America and into Europe. It has many followers in Great Britain, and as its basis for a religion is no less valid then any other faith, its followers should have the same privileges that all other religions have. Anything less could be construed as an obstruction of Pastafarian human rights.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
